hackathon-prizes.prize-content: First Place team w/ mentor, and First Place team w/o Mentor will receive an Official Raspberry Pi 3 Starter Kit for each team member.
First Place team w/ mentor, and First Place team w/o Mentor will receive a Syma X5C-1 2.4G 6 Axis GYRO HD Camera RC Quadcopter with 2.0MP Camera
We're not going to spoil it, but it's pretty jokes. Trust.
1 team will receive JBL Clip 2s for everyone in their team.
The hack with the best use of Brampton Open Data/Esri Tech will receive gift cards, t-shirts and a few odds and ends.
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Best Use of Brampton Open Data/Esri Tech

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: The team chosen by the Brampton Economic Development team will receive Jaybird X3 Bluetooth Headphones.
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Best Use of Economical Development Tech

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: The winners of the Best Developer Tool prize will receive Octocat statues.
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Best Developer Tool Prize - by Github
